alert.note: Alert for Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 5:23PM EDT until July 03 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL FAIRFIELD AND NORTHERN WESTCHESTER COUNTIES... At 522 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bedford, or near Mount Kisco, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. This severe storm will be near... Bedford around 525 PM EDT. Stamford around 540 PM EDT. New Canaan and Ridgefield around 550 PM EDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
